intro_screen.main_subtitle: I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life.
intro_bio: I'm currently a Junior at Texas A&M University.
Pursuing a B.S. in Electrical Engineering w/ a minor in Computer Science.
I'm passionate about electronics, automation, robotics, specifically autonomous systems!

section.title: ~/About
section.description: Brief information about me and some of my interests.

bio: I am currently an undergraduate student at Texas A&M University pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering with a minor in Computer Science. My work spans across electronics, automation, and robotics, with a focus on autonomous systems and deep learning.

I have a profound interest in various types of technologies, including hardware design, robotics/automation, and machine/deep learning. I'm a huge enthusiast of practical, hands-on projects. In my free time, I enjoy leading my robotics club, exploring new technologies, playing soccer, and working on personal projects that combine my love for electronics and programming.

section.title: ~/Education
section.description: Courses that I have completed or am on track to complete. Current GPA: 3.24

general.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering

section.title: ~/Experience
section.description: My current/past relevant experience. Click [here](/resume) to view my resume.

experience_items.title: Electrical Engineering Co-Op
description: Developed a Faster R-CNN model for object detection of faults in X-ray tire images.
Integrated Gocator laser sensors with PLCs for automation of rubber measurement processes.
Initiated a vision project involving a KUKA robot for barcode reading and organization of materials.

experience_items.title: Founder & President
description: Led the development of a Rubik's Cube-solving robot using OpenCV and the Kociemba module.
Organized and directed projects focused on autonomous systems and AI-robotics integration.
Mentored club members on electronics, programming, and project management.

section.title: ~/Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

project_items.description: A robot capable of solving a Rubik's Cube in under 5 seconds using OpenCV and a custom algorithm.
An autonomous RC car project using SLAM for navigation and obstacle avoidance.
A deep learning model implemented for image classification tasks, leveraging the ResNet architecture.
